heading: HR01340
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT TO INSTITUTIONALIZE A BIENNIAL OFW SUMMIT IN THE MIDDLE EAST TO SERVE AS VENUE TO DISCUSS THE ISSUES AND CONCERNS OF OUR OFWs REGARDING THEIR RIGHTS AND WELFARE
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2017-10-02

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01340
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT TO INSTITUTIONALIZE A BIENNIAL OFW SUMMIT IN THE MIDDLE EAST TO SERVE AS VENUE TO DISCUSS THE ISSUES AND CONCERNS OF OUR OFWs REGARDING THEIR RIGHTS AND WELFARE
